item.description: Sheepshead evenings continue to fill, and I'd love to keep the game going! It's the best card game around, and I'm happy to share this ancient 'Sconnie secret. In its most ideal form this is a 5 person game, so I'm going to keep registration to just the 5 for now. I will be happy to keep a waiting list for the event, though!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Monday Night Cards [Sheepshead]! Novices welcome!
